comment: Source: Szamatulski, Tess and Mark: Clone Brews Recipes for 200 Commercial Beers.
...yeah, so the cookbook calls this a Vienna Lager; however, since I'm not using a lager yeast, it's an ale: maybe an Alt?
Alt was the first batch; this time, we use lager yeast!
This beer is more malty than hoppy; next batch will be 10% more IBUs.
